{{http://www.tilix.org/img/logo.png}}

http://www.tilix.org

Tilix Linux is a complete user-friendly operating system for Bulgarian people based on Ubuntu GNU/Linux. It's easy to use for beginners; the hardware recognition is automatic and the distribution can easily be installed to your hard drive.
